column4: heyya ppl :) i have a question about user and password prompt of ftp site: i have one machine with ubuntu-server on it with vsftpd. Generally when i go to some ftp site a window appears requiring user and pass to login, but in my case when i go to my ftp server it doesnt prompt me for user and pass
but it still logs me directly without the window prompting for user and pass
Maybe the ftp client remembered your password?
